title: More Chaos, Fewer Chicanes: Will a Revised Route Bring More ‘Hell’ to Paris-Roubaix in 2025?
content:
ASO confirms key changes to men's race with promise of 'increased intensity' and a new speed-limiting measure for Arenberg; no changes to women's route.

Read the full article at More Chaos, Fewer Chicanes: Will a Revised Route Bring More ‘Hell’ to Paris-Roubaix in 2025? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
